description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Fish Chowder Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Creamy Fish Chowder Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pinch pink salt ground, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place fish fillets into a saucepan. Wash leek to remove grit and roughly chop the green top. Roughly chop 1 celery stalk and add to pan with leek, parsley and bay leaf. Pour over milk and slowly bring to the boil over a low heat. Simmer for 3 minutes, cover and remove from heat. Cool for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, finely chop the white part of the leek, remaining celery and the carrot. Remove fish from milk and roughly flake, discarding any bones. Cover and set aside. Strain milk and discard vegetables. Wash pot and return to the stove.

Melt butter and add chopped vegetables. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat and gradually stir in strained milk. Bring to the boil and stir until thickened. Season with salt and pepper. Remove from heat and stir in fish, corn and parsley.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Spoon mixture into 4 ovenproof dishes. Cover with mashed potato and bake for 10 minutes, until potato is golden and heated through.
